ComicInfo.Title: Seed Of Destruction - Part I: Alien Whisper
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:01:42. [Issue ID 36460]
ComicInfo.Tags: Steve Jenkins (Orb Industries employee),Ken Clarkson,X-O Manowar [also as Aric],Spider Aliens
ComicInfo.Summary:
Aric dons the good skin for the first time since his return from the past, only to find it changed. The armor's new form, together with sinister dreams of a golden seed and an alien arena, promise to reveal the true origin of the X-O armor!
Under attack by a squad of Spider Aliens, Aric uses his newly changed Armor to easily repulse the invaders. But he is uneasy about the sudden reappearance of his old enemies. Aric's thoughts are troubled in the days that follow, and his nightmarish dreams involve an alien ceremony for creation of the X-O Armor. At last, Aric awakens from one of the nightmares, only to find himself in the Armor, helplessly drawn toward to the Moon!
